title: iGEM Support Fund
description: To support lab operations, research operations, students support, events, training, and travel related to the iGEM (International Genetically Engineered Machine) biology competition at BioFrontiers Institute and CU Boulder.
marketingContent:
To support lab operations, research operations, students support, events, training, and travel related to the iGEM (International Genetically Engineered Machine) biology competition at BioFrontiers Institute and CU Boulder.

More information is available here https://colorado.edu/mcdb/undergraduate/igem-research-team.
